ResearchProjectDef.label: machine'o'war
ResearchProjectDef.description: The concepts and technological fundation of mechframes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: mech armor component
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the mechframe armor component, the part that forms the chassis.

ResearchProjectDef.label: mech shield component
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the mechframe shield generator, a device that projects a protective force field around the mechframe.

ResearchProjectDef.label: mech weaponry component
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the mechframe weaponry component, assorted systems that bestows mechframe aggresive capabilities.

ResearchProjectDef.label: mech control component
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the mechframe control component, the bridge between pilot and the machine.

ResearchProjectDef.label: prototype: Crow
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the prototypical mechframe: the crow. This general purpose mechframe is armed with a heavy machinegun, and having the ability of: rocket barrage, shield barrier and shock blast.

ResearchProjectDef.label: melee specialist: falcon
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the melee combat oriented mechframe: the falcon. This agile mechframe come equiped with a pair of plasma dual blades, and capable of: charged assault and active reflection.

ResearchProjectDef.label: damage specialist: owl
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the damage potential optimized mechframe: the owl. This offensive mechframe carries a versatile compound lance with switchable modes, while supplemented by a skill set of: arctic gale and frozen flood

ResearchProjectDef.label: support specialist: sparrow
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the supporter mechframe: the sparrow. This versatile mechframe comes with a light machinegun and a drone fabricator, centered around the command of: defensive order, offensive order.

ResearchProjectDef.label: modular upgrades
ResearchProjectDef.description: Enables the mechframes to be modified with modular upgrades.

ResearchProjectDef.label: heavy duty battery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Triples the power capacity of mechframes with heavy duty battery upgrade.

ResearchProjectDef.label: field supply module
ResearchProjectDef.description: Satisfies pilot's food and bed needs in action with field supply module.

ResearchProjectDef.label: solar panel module
ResearchProjectDef.description: Deploys a solar panel and recharges battery when inactive with solar pannel module.

ResearchProjectDef.label: combat recreation module
ResearchProjectDef.description: Provide a better piloting experience with the combat recreation module.
